com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.datapollingservice
Class PollingResultsDatabaseQueue

java.lang.Object
  com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.datapollingservice.PollingResultsDatabaseQueue

public class PollingResultsDatabaseQueue
extends java.lang.Object

Loop that checks FIFO queue for polling results data to insert into the database. Singleton pattern.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static PollingResultsDatabaseQueue getInstance()

addToQueue

public boolean addToQueue(PollingResult toAdd)
Adds result to database queue to be inserted into the database by the DatabaseQueueThread. Will fail if database queue is currently at capacity.

Parameters:
toAdd - - PollingResult to add
Returns:
- true for success, false if queue is at capacity

initialize

public void initialize()
Initializes PollingResultsDatabaseQueue

execute

public void execute()
Starts the database queue thread

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Sends signal to database queue thread to gracefully shut down
